channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：日经指数期待日本央行保持放松
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾谴责中国海警对菲律宾渔民的“挑衅行动”
item.description: The Philippines condemns the latest "provocative action" by Chinese coastguard against Filipino fishermen, the spokesperson of the National Security Council said on Monday.翻译:国家安全委员会发言人周一表示，菲律宾谴责中国海警对菲律宾渔民的最新“挑衅行动”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国新疆南部发生里氏5.1级地震 - GFZ
item.description: A magnitude 5.1 earthquake struck southern Xinjiang, China on Monday, the German Research Centre for Geosciences (GFZ)said.翻译:德国地球科学研究中心（GFZ）表示，周一，中国新疆南部发生了 5.1 级地震。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国山体滑坡造成两人死亡，数十人失踪
item.description: A landslide in China's Yunnan province killed two people on Monday with dozens missing as rescue operations are underway in snowy sub-zero weather.翻译:周一，中国云南省发生山体滑坡，造成两人死亡，数十人失踪，救援行动正在零度以下的降雪天气中进行。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称又发现六个中国热气球，其中一个飞越岛屿
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it had detected six more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has seen over the past month-and-a-half.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周日又发现六个中国热气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越台湾岛，这是国防部表示在过去一个半月里看到的一系列此类热气球中的最新一起。 。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在人民币面临压力的情况下，中国保持基准贷款利率稳定
item.description: China kept benchmark lending rates unchanged at their monthly fixing on Monday, matching expectations with Beijing seen as having limited scope for monetary easing amid downward pressure on the yuan.翻译:周一，中国维持基准贷款利率不变，符合人民币贬值压力下货币宽松空间有限的预期。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国不顾制裁让俄罗斯在2023年成为最大石油供应国
item.description: Russia leapfrogged Saudi Arabia to become China's top crude oil supplier in 2023, data showed on Saturday, as the world's biggest crude importer defied Western sanctions to purchase vast quantities of discounted oil for its processing plants.翻译:周六的数据显示，俄罗斯将在 2023 年超越沙特阿拉伯，成为中国最大的原油供应国，因为全球最大的原油进口国不顾西方制裁，为其加工厂购买大量折扣石油。
item.author: Andrew Hayley

item.title: 外交部长王毅表示巴西支持北京的“一个中国政策”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday welcomed Brazil's recent support for Beijing's "One China policy" that states Taiwan is an inseparable part of China, in a sign of stronger bilateral ties with South America's largest country.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周五欢迎巴西最近支持北京的“一个中国政策”，该政策称台湾是中国不可分割的一部分，这表明与南美洲最大国家的双边关系更加牢固。
item.author: Anthony Boadle

item.title: 美国农业部确认自 12 月中旬以来首次向中国出售美国大豆
item.description: The U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) on Friday confirmed private sales of 297,000 metric tons of U.S. soybeans to China, the first soybean sales announcement under its daily reporting rules since Dec. 19 and the first to the world's top buyer of the oilseed since Dec. 15.翻译:美国农业部 (USDA) 周五确认向中国私下出售了 297,000 吨美国大豆，这是自 12 月 19 日以来根据其每日报告规则首次发布的大豆销售公告，也是自 12 月以来首次向全球最大油籽买家发布的大豆销售公告。 . 15.
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国财政部和中国金融官员同意在北京会谈后继续会面
item.description: Meetings between U.S. Treasury and Chinese financial officials in Beijing this week concluded with both sides agreeing to continue to meet regularly, the Treasury Department said on Friday.翻译:美国财政部周五表示，美国财政部和中国金融官员本周在北京举行的会议结束，双方同意继续定期会面。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国大使馆警告韩国整形手术风险
item.description: China's embassy in Seoul has warned citizens against the dangers of having plastic surgery done in South Korea, from the risk of death to major facial changes that make it difficult to pass through immigration checks.翻译:中国驻首尔大使馆警告公民注意在韩国进行整形手术的危险，从死亡风险到导致难以通过移民检查的重大面部变化。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国命令负债累累的地方政府停止一些基础设施项目-消息人士
item.description: China has instructed heavily indebted local governments to delay or halt some state-funded infrastructure projects, three people with knowledge of the situation said, as Beijing struggles to contain debt risks even as it tries to stimulate the economy.翻译:三名知情人士表示，中国已指示负债累累的地方政府推迟或停止一些国家资助的基础设施项目，因为北京在努力刺激经济的同时也难以控制债务风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国基金经理自掏腰包推出股票基金
item.description: In the face of intense pressure from authorities to help revive a sickly stock market, Chinese fund management companies are increasingly launching equity funds that are bankrolled mostly by the firm's own money.翻译:面对当局要求重振病态股市的巨大压力，中国基金管理公司越来越多地推出主要由公司自有资金提供资金的股票基金。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Vidya Ranganathan

item.title: 红海航运袭击给中国出口商造成延误、成本上升的压力
item.description: For Chinese businessman Han Changming, disruptions to Red Sea freight are threatening the survival of his trading company in the eastern province of Fujian.翻译:对于中国商人韩昌明来说，红海货运中断正威胁着他位于东部福建省的贸易公司的生存。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Casey Hall, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国与毛泽东时代的增长调情
item.description: The latest readouts on economic and population trends in China are remarkable, highlighting the immense long-term challenges ahead and dragging the growth profile of the world's second-largest economy back to the insular days of the 1970s.翻译:关于中国经济和人口趋势的最新数据引人注目，突显了未来巨大的长期挑战，并将世界第二大经济体的增长状况拖回了 20 世纪 70 年代的孤立时期。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国敦促与中国讨论切实可行的降低核风险措施
item.description: The United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday.翻译:一位白宫高级官员周四表示，美国预计不会很快与中国进行正式的核军控谈判，但确实希望看到开始讨论实际的降低风险措施。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中美财长会议在北京召开
item.description: U.S. Treasury and Chinese Finance Ministry officials started a two-day meeting in Beijing on Thursday to discuss financial stability and capital markets issues between the two economic powers, deepening an engagement revived last year.翻译:美国财政部和中国财政部官员周四在北京开始为期两天的会议，讨论两个经济大国之间的金融稳定和资本市场问题，加深了去年恢复的接触。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国通过丝绸之路大型港口拓宽南美贸易高速公路
item.description: A Chinese mega port is rising on the Pacific coast, promising to turbo charge trade ties with South America.翻译:一个中国大型港口正在太平洋沿岸崛起，有望增强与南美的贸易关系。
item.author: Marco Aquino, Adam Jourdan

item.title: 独家：如果边境保持平静，印度可能放松对中国的投资限制
item.description: India could ease its heightened scrutiny of Chinese investments if the two countries' border remains peaceful, a senior Indian official said in the first signal that the four-year-old curbs could be lifted.翻译:印度一名高级官员表示，如果两国边境保持和平，印度可能会放松对中国投资的严格审查，这是印度可能取消长达四年的限制的首个信号。
item.author: Una Galani,, Peter Thal Larsen

item.title: 中国人口老龄化威胁转向新经济增长模式
item.description: Beijing's key policy goals for the coming decade of boosting domestic consumption and reining in debt face a threat.翻译:北京未来十年刺激国内消费和控制债务的主要政策目标面临威胁。
item.author: Farah Master
